mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ASSETSHIST( HIST_ID, ASSET_ID, ORGNZT_ID, PRJ_ID, USE_ID, HIST_STATUS, HIST_DATE,
RCPT_DATE,
RCPT_ID, CARRY_REASON, APPROVAL, HIST_GROUP ) VALUES ( #{histId}, #{assetId}, #{orgnztId}, #{prjId}, #{useId}, #{histStatus}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),
DATE_FORMAT(#{rcptDate}, '%Y-%m-%d'),
#{rcptId}, #{carryReason}, #{approval}, #{histGroup} )
